p: There are perennials, aromatic herbs with tuberous rhizomes, and secretory cells with ethereal oils. With around 1000 species and 50 genera, this plant group grows in pantropical areas and is especially diverse in Southeastern Asia, typically in shady, lowland forests with rich soil. Among the most popular species are ginger, cardamom, and turmeric. Within this plant family, there are numerous ornamental species (torch ginger, golden brush, dancing girl, etc.).
